docs.title: Introduce - 介绍
docs.text: Python cmd 一个自己纯属闲的没事制作的小程序 A small program that is purely idle and free to create

docs.title: TUI Release - TUI 正式版本
docs.text: Python cmd的正式版本目前仅仅更新到了1.0.2。纯属是懒得做，而且做有个屁用！The official version of Python cmd has only been updated to 1.0.2. It's purely lazy to do it, and it's useless to do it.

docs.title: GUI Beta - GUI 测试版本
docs.text: Python cmd GUI从开发起到现在有些年头了。目前做了整体的内部框架。Python cmd GUI has been in development for some years now. We have currently developed an overall internal framework.

docs.title: 1. Introduction to Python cmd - 初识 Python cmd
docs.text:
Python cmd is a mini program developed on July 1, 2023. The initial code looked like this:Python cmd是在2023/7/1日开发的一个小程序。最初的代码是长这样的：

print("...")
while True:
    User = input("C:\>")
    if ...:
        ...
    elif ...:
        ...
    else:
        ...

How is it going? Isn't it a shitty mountain? It's normal, I was just introduced to Python at that time, that's why I made this little thing.怎么样？是不是很屎山？很正常，那时我才刚刚接触Python，所以才做出了这个小东西。Then, I came into contact with the os module and made some changes to the source code, making it look like this:然后，我接触了os模块，改动了一下源代码，变成了这样：

import os
path = os.getcwd()

...

while True:
    User = input(path + "\\>")
    if ...:
        ...
    elif ...:
        ...
    else:
        ...

......Let's not talk about the code anymore, so let's start using the manual directly! Pure handwriting!代码啥的咱就不说了，那么直接开始使用手册吧！纯手写的！

docs.title: 2-1. Directory operation - 目录操作
docs.text: cd <directory>: Enter a specific directorycd .. cd..: Go back to the previous directorydir: View files and folders in the current directorytree: View all files and folders in the current directory in a tree view.cd <目录>：进入某目录cd .. cd..：返回上一级目录dir：查看当前目录下的文件和文件夹tree：以树状视图查看当前目录下的所有文件和文件夹

docs.title: 2-2. File and folder operation - 文件和文件夹操作
docs.text: del <file/folder>: Delete a specified file or foldermd <name>: Create a new folderrename <file/folder> <new name>: Rename a specified file or folderstart <file>: Open a specified file.del <文件/文件夹>：删除指定的文件或文件夹md <名称>：创建一个新的文件夹rename <文件/文件夹> <新名称>：将指定的文件或文件夹重命名start <文件>：打开指定的文件

docs.title: 2-3. Others - 其它
docs.text: Ver: View Current Versioncopyright: View Copyrightipconfig: View Current Media Connection Informationecho <string>: Output string to screenpause: PausePython: Open Python currently installed on the systempause start: Open PAUSE Programming help: View Help exit quit: Exit ver：查看当前版本copyright：查看版权ipconfig：查看当前媒体连接信息echo <字符串>：将字符串输出到屏幕上pause：暂停python：打开当前系统安装的Pythonpause start：打开PAUSE编程help：查看帮助exit quit：退出
